• Engineer, HIG HBM Product & System Engineering (Media Health Reliability Coding)Singapore, SingaporePosted a month ago Enrolled in a Bachelor’s or Master’s program or equivalent experience in Electrical or Computer Engineering.
• Experience validating products with hardware, firmware, and software components.
• Experience using lab equipment such as oscilloscopes and logic analyzers.
• Hands-on experience programming and debugging FPGAs or microcontrollers.
• Experience with RTL modeling using Verilog or SystemVerilog.
• Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
• Knowledge of memory interfaces and protocols (e.
• , LPDDR, DDR, HBM, GDDR, CXL, UCIe, PCIe).

• AAS or AS Degree in Mechatronics, Electronics, Mechanical Engineering, Science, Physics, Mathematics, or Supply Chain Management (or equivalent trade school/military experience).
• 2 years of experience maintaining manufacturing equipment, automation systems, or technical military experience.
• 2+ year experience identifying performance gaps and implementing strategic improvements.
• Less than 2 years Process and Equipment Technician - Veterans and Transitioning MilitaryBoise, Idaho, United States of America + 1 morePosted a month ago Indirect Regional Supplier ManagerBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 2 months ago.
